#summary Tested Configurations.

= Introduction =

In theory any modern J2EE 1.4 and later server will work. Currently only the following have been tested.

|| JBoss || 4.03 || OK ||
|| JBoss || 4.2 || OK ||
|| JBoss || 5.0 || OK ||
|| Glassfish || 2.1 || Not OK - keeps allocating endpoints (pool working?) ||
|| Glassfish || 3.0 || Not tested ||
|| Weblogic || X || Not tested ||
|| Websphere || X || Not tested ||
